name: ListeriosisTestsForListeriaMonocytogenesNucleicAcid
title: Listeriosis (Tests for Listeria monocytogenes Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting nucleic acid of Listeria monocytogenes),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Listeria probe; non-probe),(Exclusion Criteria: positive blood culture tests)
